reader_identity = #{readerIdentity,jdbcType=INTEGER},

where reserve_id = #{reserveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update reserve set isbn = #{isbn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reader_id = #{readerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, reader_identity = #{readerIdentity,jdbcType=INTEGER}, reserve_time = #{reserveTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where reserve_id = #{reserveId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
